member.name: E:SoftGear.Strix.Client.Room.RoomClient`2.RoomJoinNotified
member.summary: Event fired when a new member joins a room you're currently a member of. This event is not invoked for the newly joined member.

member.name: E:SoftGear.Strix.Client.Room.RoomClient`2.RoomLeaveNotified
member.summary: Event fired when another room member leaves a room you're currently a member of. This event is not invoked if you are the one leaving.

member.name: E:SoftGear.Strix.Client.Room.RoomClient`2.RoomDeleteNotified
member.summary: Event fired when the room you're currently a member of gets deleted. You will receive this event even if you are the one deleting the room, just before event.

member.name: E:SoftGear.Strix.Client.Room.RoomClient`2.RoomSetNotified
member.summary: Event fired when the room's owner changes its properties.

member.name: E:SoftGear.Strix.Client.Room.RoomClient`2.RoomSetMemberNotified
member.summary: Event fired when another room member changes their properties in a room you're currently a member of. You will not receive this event if you are the one changing the properties.

member.name: E:SoftGear.Strix.Client.Room.RoomClient`2.RoomDirectRelayNotified
member.summary: Event fired when you or another members sends you a direct relay message. Unlike RPCs, you will not receive this event if you are not the target of the message.

member.name: E:SoftGear.Strix.Client.Room.RoomClient`2.RoomRelayNotified
member.summary: Event fired when another room member sends a relay message to a room you're currently a member of. You will not receive this event if you are the one sending the message.

member.name: E:SoftGear.Strix.Client.Room.RoomClient`2.RoomCreated
member.summary: Event fired when you create a room.

member.name: E:SoftGear.Strix.Client.Room.RoomClient`2.RoomSet
member.summary: Event fired when you change a room's properties.

member.name: E:SoftGear.Strix.Client.Room.RoomClient`2.RoomDeleted
member.summary: Event fired when you delete a room. This event is invoked after .

member.name: E:SoftGear.Strix.Client.Room.RoomClient`2.RoomJoined
member.summary: Event fired when you join a room.

member.name: E:SoftGear.Strix.Client.Room.RoomClient`2.RoomLeft
member.summary: Event fired when you leave a room.
